alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 29 at 10:11AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. For the Horse Creek...including Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Horse Creek Near Arcadia at SR 72. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The access road to Hidden Acres is impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EDT Monday the stage was 11.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Wednesday morning and continue rising to a crest of 12.2 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.2 feet on 11/24/1997. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Horse Creek Arcadia at SR 7 12.0 11.1 Mon 9 am 11.7 12.1 12.1 11.8 11.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued tonight by 1100 PM EDT.
